broadwick.config

Class ConfigValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.config.ConfigValidator

  • public final class ConfigValidator
extends Object
    Validator class for configuration files supplied to Broadwick, the framework for epidemiological modelling.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ConfigValidationErrors errors 
      private Project project 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigValidator(Project project)
      Create an validator instance that is capable of checking the content of a configuration file.

      • project

        private Project project

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigValidator

        public ConfigValidator(Project project)
        Create an validator instance that is capable of checking the content of a configuration file.
        Parameters:
        project - the contents of the [read] configuration file. project.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public ConfigValidationErrors validate()
        Validate the project.
        Returns:
        a ConfigValidationErrors object that contains all the errors (if any).

      • validateModels

        private void validateModels()
        Validate the Models section of the configuration file. Any errors will be saved in the local ValidationErrors.

      • getValidatedProject

        public Project getValidatedProject()
        If the project has been validated, i.e. it is structurally ok, then this method will simply return the project supplied in this objects constructor, else it will return null.
        Returns:
        null if the project is invalid (i.e. contains major errors) else returns the project object supplied to the constructor.

      • createObject

        private <T> T createObject(Class<T> clazz,
                 String name)
        Create an object through reflection, to use this method to create a solver object Solver solverObj = this.createObject(Solver.class, "RungeKutta4");
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to create.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class type of the object we will create.
        name - the name of the class that is to be instantiated.
        Returns:
        the created object.
